author: deme1744
content:
On another note: I think we (Fluffy team) never gave feedback on the idea of having this functionality document: https://notes.ethereum.org/8LbisMwtR4yK64SBosb_2g
I think it can be a great help for client implementers, to track functionality and  also because purely specifications might not always give an immediate idea of the amount of work/features it actually contains.
So for Fluffy I've actually copied it into an issue (https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth1/issues/830) that we will use to prioritize work and also for externals to have a quick view of the state of the Fluffy project (and thus compatibility or lack thereof).
